name: ARPlaneAnchor.Classification
desc: Possible characterizations of real-world surfaces represented by plane anchors.

items.name: case wall
items.desc: The plane anchor represents a real-world wall or similar large vertical surface.

items.name: case floor
items.desc: The plane anchor represents a real-world floor, ground plane, or similar large horizontal surface.

items.name: case ceiling
items.desc: The plane anchor represents a real-world ceiling or similar overhead horizontal surface.

items.name: case table
items.desc: The plane anchor represents a real-world table, desk, bar, or similar flat surface.

items.name: case seat
items.desc: The plane anchor represents a real-world chair, stool, bench or similar flat surface.

items.name: case door
items.desc: The plane anchor represents a real-world door or similar vertical surface.

items.name: case window
items.desc: The plane anchor represents a real-world window or similar vertical surface.

items.name: case none(ARPlaneAnchor.Classification.Status)
items.desc: No classification is available for the plane anchor.

items.name: enum ARPlaneAnchor.Classification.Status
items.desc: Reasons ARKit is unable to classify a plane.
